sentence: Another Republican from Ohio, Representative Jim Jordan, who claims that Dr. Fauci knew the coronavirus “came from a lab,” has vowed that Republicans will investigate him if they win control of the House.
title: Republicans, Wooing Trump Voters, Make Fauci Their Boogeyman

sentence: Late last year, the House select committee investigating the Jan. 6 attack took a bold step: The panel asked three Republican members of Congress — Pennsylvania’s Scott Perry, Ohio’s Jim Jordan, and California’s Kevin McCarthy — to voluntarily cooperate with investigators.
author: Steve Benen
title: After being scorned by Trump, will Brooks answer Jan. 6 questions?

sentence: “People in Congress, from Senators Rand Paul and Ted Cruz to Congressmen Marjorie Taylor Greene, Brian Babin, Thomas Massie, Jim Jordan, Scott Perry and many, many others know Alabama’s Senate race is a no-brainer.
author: Yaffee
title: Chairman of House Freedom Caucus endorses Mo Brooks – He ‘fights unwaveringly for our conservative values’
